Title: Incentivizing supplemental math assignments and using AI-generated hints is associated with improved exam performance
2.2 Description of context: The feedback context is described as AI-generated hints integrated into homework assignments, providing qualitative explanations related to physics problems. These hints aim to guide students without giving away full solutions.
2.3 Our evaluation: The quality/type of feedback is characterized as relevant and beneficial for developing students' problem-solving skills.
3.1 Agency type: Students have agency in choosing to use optional supports (supplemental math assignments and AI-generated hints).
3.2 Feedback timing control: Yes, students control the timing of feedback as they can access AI-generated hints at any time while working on homework.
4.1 Metrics for evaluation: Metrics include exam scores, completion rates of supplemental math assignments, and usage rates of AI-generated hints.
4.2 Measurement of agency: Agency is measured through the completion rates of supplemental math assignments and the usage of AI-generated hints, as well as through demographic analyses of participation.
